citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 p.m. on
09/08/2014. The licensee is in traveling status and no itinerary is on file. A responsible adult shall be made
available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
